sentences.english: Theme song from Saiunkoku Monogatari anime.
Consider roses. Red roses mean, "I love you."
sentences.chinese: 想想玫瑰吧，红玫瑰的物语是“我爱你。”

sentences.english: Lady Murasaki Shikubu's The Tale of Genji is seen as the first of its kind in literature.
sentences.chinese: 紫式部的《源氏物语》被看作是这类文学的开山鼻祖。

sentences.english: "Cute bacteria bathing suit", the story of the eruption of bacteria was used in the image of all sorts of cute bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 采用了《萌菌物语》中各式各样的萌菌的形象。

sentences.english: Genji is undoubtedly the most attractive female figure.
sentences.chinese: 紫姬无疑是《源氏物语》中最引人注目的女性形象。

sentences.english: The Tale of Genji is the earliest and best novel with prose form in the world.
sentences.chinese: 《源氏物语》是世界上最早最优秀的散文体长篇小说。

sentences.english: A Song of Wind and Flowers.
sentences.chinese: 双星物语的风雨花之歌。

sentences.english: I was quite bored and then suddenly on came Creature Comforts.
sentences.chinese: 我已经相当厌倦了，这时《动物物语》突然放映了。

sentences.english: Still, it was large enough to hold moon-viewing parties for guests in model of the Tale of Genji.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这是够大举行月球观赏各方客人模型源氏物语。

definition: cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
oriental cherry (Prunus serrulata or Prunus yedoensis), prized for its blossom/also known as sakura (Japanese) or Yoshino cherry
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
